description.value: Choose two of the following formulas: @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.M1k5QQc1qQLxzyCK]{Acid Flask (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.yd3kEK21YknZLlcT]{Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.AFR01HVd7DcZvkpP]{Bottled Lightning (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.EpxmUtLpCkE8R6KJ]{Frost Vial (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.T6Appwwl6nUl56Xj]{Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Xnqglykl3Cif8rN9]{Thunderstone (Lesser)}.
